dashboard.autoSwitchLabel: Automatically switch to other nodes in this country based on network conditions
dashboard.autoSwitchInfo: The system will automatically switch to other available nodes in this country based on network conditions
dashboard.autoSwitchExplanationSpecific: Will automatically switch to other available nodes in this country based on network conditions
dashboard.autoSwitchExplanationGeneral: Will automatically select and switch to the best node based on network conditions
dashboard.noNodesDescription: No tunnel nodes found. Please check your network connection and try refreshing.
dashboard.muxDescription: ##Lower latency, faster speed##. Multiple requests transmitted through one channel, like opening multiple lanes on a motorway, ##reducing queuing time##. Ideal for video streaming and gaming.
dashboard.concurrentDescription: ##Use multiple nodes simultaneously## for faster and more stable connections. Like taking multiple routes at once - if one's blocked, you have others. ##Especially effective when networks are restricted##, Pro exclusive feature.
dashboard.anonymityDescription: ##Use different IP addresses for connecting to servers and accessing websites##, protecting your real location from being tracked. Like wearing a double mask, safer privacy. Note: May slightly affect speed, Pro exclusive feature.
dashboard.fakeIPDescription: Assigns virtual IPs to domains that need proxying. DNS resolution happens server-side for faster connections and better privacy.
dashboard.selectServerHint: Select a server from the list below to start

serviceFailure.title: Service Connection Failed
serviceFailure.message: Unable to connect to VPN service. Please check if the service is running.

serviceError.title: Service Error
serviceError.subtitle: The VPN core service is not running properly
serviceError.reason1Desc: The application may have encountered an issue during update, causing service components to not install correctly.
serviceError.reason2Desc: Security software like 360 or Tencent PC Manager may have mistakenly identified the VPN service as a risk and blocked it.
serviceError.solutionDesc: Please visit our website to download and reinstall the latest version to fix this issue.
serviceError.persistentDesc: If you still encounter this issue after reinstalling, please submit a ticket and our support team will assist you.

guestEmpty.title: Login to Get Nodes
guestEmpty.description: Login to get cloud nodes and enjoy more stable service.

loginBanner.message: Login to unlock more cloud nodes

tunnels.title: Node Management
tunnels.description: Manage your local node configurations. Add custom nodes or login to sync cloud nodes.
tunnels.loginHint: Login to sync cloud node configurations

empty.title: No Nodes
empty.description: Click the button below to add your first node

deleteConfirm.title: Delete Node
deleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete the node "{{name}}" ?

selfDeploy.title: Self-Deploy Service
selfDeploy.description: We are developing a self-deploy feature that allows you to deploy nodes on your own servers. This feature will be released after the project goes open source.
selfDeploy.openSourceNote: Deploy and customise freely after open source release

cloudNodes.title: Cloud Nodes
cloudNodes.description: Login to get cloud nodes, ready to use without self-deployment.
cloudNodes.usingCloud: You are using cloud nodes. Go back to home to select a node.

form.name: Node Name
form.addressesHelp: Separate multiple addresses with commas, default port 443
form.addrsRequired: Please enter at least one address
form.anonymityHelp: Randomly select address for better privacy

troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
troubleshooting.subtitle: Diagnose network connection issues through speed tests and network repairs

securitySoftware.title: Security software whitelist settings
securitySoftware.description: If VPN connection is blocked by security software like 360 or Tencent PC Manager, please view the setup guide

serverList.startFailed: Failed to start server list retrieval
